mapper.select: SELECT vp.viewing_pay_code AS viewingPayCode, vp.viewing_pay_price AS viewingPayPrice, vp.created_at AS createdAt, vp.viewing_pay_refund_date AS viewingPayRefundDate, u.user_name AS userName, u.user_email AS userEmail, vp.viewing_pay_customer_key AS customerKey, vp.viewing_pay_order_id AS orderId, vp.viewing_pay_payment_key AS paymentKey, vp.viewing_pay_status AS viewingPayStatus FROM viewing_pay vp JOIN member u ON u.user_code = vp.user_code WHERE vp.viewing_pay_code = #{payCode}
